Table of Contents
  • Features
    • Features Implemented
    • Features not Implemented

Features

Features Implemented

  1. Provides protection for Google Docs and Zoho Writer.
  2. Designed in a generic way, so adding protection to new web applications should be trivial and require no additional development.

Features not Implemented

  1. Currently password management has not been implemented completely.We plan to implement this soon.
  2. Collaboration in the case where multiple users are editing the document simultaneously has not been handled.Some possible approaches to handle this have been discussed but not implemented.
  3. Some features such as server side spell-check and search cannot be implemented in the current way. Alternative approaches have been discussed but not implemented
